name: Glitched (RaulCarcelGames)
description:
Play with gravity and travel the platforms to rejoin the dimensions !

Glitched brings you a challenging platform game in which you will have control of two cubes to rejoin the two dimensions playing with gravity.

Test your mental agility and complete the screens before the time runs out.

Fun mechanics, simple but incredible visual section.

Will you be able to complete all the levels? With all its stars?

Characteristics:
· High contrast and daring gameplay!
· Challenge yourself in this almost impossible challenge!
